title: # [Semi-Auto-NovelAI-to-Pixiv](https://github.com/zhulinyv/Semi-Auto-NovelAI-to-Pixiv) | 带有 WebUI 的 NovelAI 量产工具

t2i.description: > Equivalent to using NovelAI official website, supporting your favorite style combination. If no image is returned, it's mostly due to 5xx (server overload), 429 (request too fast), 443 (unstable node), anyway, it's not my problem ヾ(≧▽≦*)o

i2i.input_path: Batch Processing Path (Effective only on the computer where this program runs)

random blue picture.description: > Generates a blue picture by randomly combining tags from ./files/favorite

random picture.description: > Generates a picture using *.txt files in ./file/prompt as prompts, for a random selection of art styles, please refer to About Random Astringency in other sections of the configuration settings interface
random picture.text2image_sfw_random_artists_top_switch: Randomly select the art style and add it to the top
random picture.text2image_sfw_random_artists_last_switc: Randomly select the art style and add it to the end
random picture.text2image_sfw_prevent_to_move_switch: Prevents prompt files from being moved after generation

inpaint.description: > Redraws images using masks (First, click the image button below the repaint component to upload the image, and then click the paint button to apply a topic)
inpaint.input_path: Batch Processing Image Path (Effective only on the computer where this program runs)
inpaint.mask_path: Batch Processing Mask Path (redrawn area is white, remaining is transparent instead of black)

super resolution.description: > Enlarges and denoises images using different engines

mosaic.description: > Automatically applies mosaic to key parts
mosaic.yolo:
Manually install the ultralytics dependency library to use **YOLO** for image prediction(Slower speed, higher accuracy):

Open cmd or powershell in the Project Directory and execute the following commands(It takes effect after the project is successfully installed and restarted):

water mark.description: > Before using, please prepare your own watermarks in ./files/water folder

pixiv.description: > Uploads images or image sets to Pixiv, you can check the upload progress in the command line

selector.description: > Facilitates manual image selection, you can use the arrow keys on your keyboard (very simple buttons, should be self-explanatory...)

rm png info.description: > Erase or restore image generation information
rm png info.input_path: Directory of Images to Be Restored
rm png info.remove_pnginfo_metadate: Custom metadata after removing the pnginfo

example.positive: [suimya, muririn], artist:ciloranko,[artist:sho_(sho_lwlw)],[[tianliang duohe fangdongye]], [eip (pepai)], [rukako], [[[memmo]]], [[[[[hoshi (snacherubi)]]]]], year 2023, 1girl, cute, loli,
example.negative: nsfw, lowres, {bad}, error, fewer, extra, missing, worst quality, jpeg artifacts, bad quality, watermark, unfinished, displeasing, chromatic aberration, signature, extra digits, artistic error, username, scan, [abstract],

description.img_size: Resolution of generated images(Large-resolution note point consumption)
description.t2i_cool_time: Cooling time for Text-to-Image (in seconds, fluctuates within 3 seconds)
description.pixiv_cookie: Cookie used for uploading to Pixiv
description.i2i_cool_time: Cooling time for Image-to-Image (in seconds, fluctuates within 3 seconds)
description.pixiv_token: x-csrf-token used for uploading to Pixiv
description.allow_tag_edit: Whether to allow other users to edit tags
description.caption_prefix: Prefix for descriptions when uploading to Pixiv
description.rep_tags: Whether to shuffle and replace some tags in Pixiv descriptions
description.rep_tags_per: How much to replace (default is 0.5 for replacing half. When set to 1, prompt is not used as a description)
description.pixiv_cool_time: Cooling time for uploading to Pixiv (in minutes, fluctuates within 5 minutes)
description.neighbor: Side length of square mosaic relative to image
description.meta_data: Information added when clearing meta data
description.revert_info_: Whether to restore the picture information after the mosaic, water mark, waifu2x, etc is completed
description.alpha: Opacity of watermark (0~1, larger values mean more transparent)
description.position: Possible positions where watermark may appear
description.rotate: The degree of rotation of the watermark
description.warning: Detected shared link enabled, some privacy configurations are hidden!

description.tab0_1: 1. Experimental feature, please pay attention to each step's options
description.tab0_2: 2. ControlNet is not available, the results may not be optimal
description.tab0_3: 3. Translation for some pages is pending
description.tab2: Please visit the Spell Parsing - Tagger page for batch prompt generation
description.tab3: Please visit the Image Generation - Image Generation page for single image testing

func.video_save_path: Video Save Directory (do not place in the same directory as the original video)

tile.description: > Can enlarge a high-resolution image using nai3 without consuming points
tile.image: Input Image (use image if path is empty)
tile.positive: Quality-word style fusion (do not recommend adding character descriptions)

director_tools.title: Director Tools
director_tools.description: > Use a variety of AI tools to edit your images.
